descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
In Perspective VR, you engage in a mind-stimulating puzzle experience where your perception skills take centre stage.

The game revolves around manipulating simple, vibrant shapes within a three-dimensional space. 
What sets it apart is the challenge of positioning these objects accurately based on their shadows or perspective images in the X, Y, and Z axes.

The challenge lies in aligning these shapes precisely based on the information provided by three images—depicting the X, Y, and Z perspectives or shadows; your focus is on accurately interpreting and applying the spatial details presented in these three images to complete each puzzle successfully.

The relaxing VR environment & sounds enhance the puzzle-solving experience, allowing you to interact with the objects using controllers or Hand Tracking.

The game offers a variety of puzzles, including 12 new daily challenges, 30 weekly puzzles, and 48 monthly puzzles, ensuring a constant stream of fresh and engaging content. The upcoming online mode promises to add another layer of complexity to the game, providing even more brain-boosting challenges for players to enjoy
